channel.title: Friday on Derek's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Friday on Derek's Blog

item.title: Who Wants to Play Fibbage?
item.description: Fibbage Fridays! I will make it a thing. 9pm sharp! Anyone who is interested is welcome. We will stream the game. Last time we used google hangouts. We will be trying mixer this time around. And then all you need is to go to jackbox.tv and put in the code, that will be displayed on the stream. Also I got my tag system working on this blog. I’m testing an image this time.
